runs.comm: starts with a short of a length ball on middle stump, the ball catches Vincent high on the pads, rolls to the off side, they take a single
drifts on the pads, keeps it short of a length, McCullum works it to the on side
good length, outside off and just shaping away, Vincent respects the bowler and lets it go
good length on off stump, cuts in a little, Vincent gets his foot forwads, nudges it with soft hands to point, sets off for a run
angled away from the right-hander, left alone to Dhoni
outside edge, the batsman opens the face of the bat and glides it down to third man intentionally, third man was too square to cut that off

good start, short of a length, the ball cuts in sharply, catches Vincent by surprise, he plays it down with soft hands and sets off quickly, RP charges down to cut it off, gathers the ball and has a shy at the non striker's stumps
rush of blood, McCullum has a wild swish outside off and misses
drifting on the body, tucked away to the on side
short of a length on leg stump, Vincent shapes to pull and the ball catches him on the glove, the ball rolls to the on side
good length on off stump, shapes away, pushed to the off side

sharp reflexes from Dinesh Karthik! short of a length on leg stump, Vincent pulls, mistimes it, the ball goes low to Karthik at midwicket who throws himself forward and gathers it inches off the ground
full, on off stump and waiting to be driven, McCullum does just that and beats mid-off
good length on off and middle, McCullum goes back and defends back to the bowler
Sreesanth brings the length a little fuller, gets it to shape away after pitching, McCullum lets it go
lovely timing! good length outside off and shaping away, McCullum gets forward, opens the face and drives it sweetly past cover
this one bisects the arc between mid-off and cover, Sreesanth gives him a little too much width and McCullum accepts the offering, gets his feet nicely to the pitch of the ball and drives
left alone safely to the keeper
good length outside off, big away swing, left alone
RP holds the length back a little, maintains the line outside off, Fulton pushes to cover
McCullum goes for the big hit, shuffles to the off stump, tries to pull, the ball goes down leg and the umpire calls a wide
good length outside off, McCullum rocks backwards and cuts it fiercely past point
short and pulled away with might, McCullum picks the length early, swivels and pulls over square leg, one bounce and four
fuller in length, on the pads and cutting in, the ball clips the pads and lobs up
good length on off stump, McCullum gets forward and drives to mid-off
just outside off, not enough room to cut, McCullum goes back and chops it down to cover
Agarkar starts off well, works up good pace, pitches around the off stump, shapes away, left alone
teases him with fuller length, draws Fulton to the drive, misses it and nearly gets an edge
Fulton drives, the ball gets the underedge of his bat and rolls to the vacant area behind the wicket, easy single
fullish, outside off, driven off the front foot to point
overpitched outside off and swinging away, Fulton gets forward and drives, finds the fielder at point
holds the length back outside off, Fulton drives to Karthik to cover
good length outside off, in the slot to cut, McCullum gets his foot across and finds the gap perfectly between cover and extra cover
and again! RP errs in length outside off, McCullum stays at the crease and cuts this between point and cover
the change of attack results in a dot ball, yorker length on middle and leg, pushed to extra cover, quick single
good length, on the pads, Fulton tries to work it to the on side, the ball clips his pads and rolls away
drifting on the pads again, rolls to the on side
pitched up on leg stump, Fulton drives uppishly to mid-on, safe from the fielder
slower ball, loopy bouncer, cathes Fulton by surprise, lets it go
short of a length outside off, cut to third man, RP Singh is a little slow to get to it
good comeback by Agarkar, in the corridor of uncertainty outside off, Fulton gets forward to drive and the ball nearly catches the outside edge
same nagging line outside off, swing and a  miss, and still no outside edge
superb timing! on the pads, Fulton stays at the crease and effortlessly scoops it high over midwicket, the ball gets the elevation and lands plenty of rows back
pushed to mid-off, the batsmen set off quickly and complete the single
what a welcome! full and outside off, McCullum picks the length and hits it high over the bowler
outside off and pushed to deep point
pushed back to the bowler
full and driven hard to mid-off, Sehwag fumbles and that's an offering to the batsmen
outside off and maybe a little too harsh for the umpire Nigel Long to call that a wide
good length outside off and left alone
drifting on the pads and worked away off the hips to the fielder at deep square leg
gentle loosener on off and middle, chipped away high to the on side, the ball nearly travels to the deep midwicket boundary
pushed to the on side
tossed up on off and middle, pushed to midwicket
doosra, Fulton reads it on time and cuts to point
sees the batsman charging down and fires it in quicker, pushed back firmly to Harbhajan
pushed in flat and fast, Fulton tries to work it to the on side, beaten for pace, the ball strikes him on the base of the pad in front of leg stump, straightforward decision
Dhoni stands up to the stumps, slower ball, full, worked to midwicket
good length on leg stump, strikes him on the pad, the ball rolls back to Pathan
good length on the pads, worked away to the fine leg
fullish, outside off, McCullum gets a big stride forward and sets off, good running results in an extra run, McCullum dives at the crease
pushed to mid-off
Pathan errs in line, drifts on the pads, worked away fine, beats the fielder at short fine leg
Taylor said that his favourite shot was the slog sweep and he executes it to perfection against Harbhajan's flighted delivery on off stump, that sailed into the midwicket stands
nudged towards square leg for a sharp single
McCullum pushes a flat and quick delivery towards cover point
Taylor's foxed by the doosra and his limp front-foot defence lobs in the air but falls safely on the off side
driven to long on for a single

caught! Harbhajan strikes! He bowls it flat outside the off stump, McCullum tries to slog sweep him over the midwicket boundary, he doesn't get the needed distance and holes out to Gambhir who takes a well-judged catch at wide long on
tossed up outside the off stump, Styris moves a long way across and tries to paddle sweep, he gets beaten by the turn away from him
this time he does connect with the paddle sweep and gets a single to long leg
swept once again to deep backward square leg and the batsmen run superbly for the second
bowled much slower through the air and Taylor who got into position way too early has to let the ball go outside off stump
lbw! Taylor moves a long way across his stumps and tries to sweep, Yuvraj follows up a slow delivery with a quick one this time and beats Taylor and hits him plumb in front
again Yuvraj floats it slowly outside off stump, excellent change of pace, McMillan plays it towards backward point
played off the pads behind square
quick delivery on off stump, defended back to the bowler
slower through the air and fuller length as well, driven on the front foot to long on

run out! Styris pushed the ball off his pads towards midwicket and called for a risky single, Yuvraj charges in from midwicket, picks the ball up cleanly, turns, and in one smooth motion, throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end with Styris short of his ground
hits the pads and they run a leg bye to short fine leg
wide outside off stump, lots of turn there but it's a wide
played off the pads to long leg where Agarkar does the fielding
Oram pushes hard at the ball off the front foot and gets an inside edge that flies over middle stump and runs down to the fine-leg boundary
the leading edge runs through cover point for a single
McMillan brings up New Zealand's 100 with a  front-foot cover drive to deep cover
pushed into the covers for a quick single
driven through cover point for one more
McMillan chips the ball high in the air but it falls safely in front of the fielder at long-off
full ball on middle stump, McMillan moves across his stumps and sweeps to deep backward square leg
superb stroke! Harbhajan comes round the wicket and bowls a full toss on off stump, Oram leans forward and plays a very fine reverse sweep that runs to the third-man boundary
defended towards backward point and they run a very quick single
bowled full and fast into the blockhole, McMillan pushes it towards midwicket but decide not to take on Yuvraj
lofted over extra cover for two more runs
Harbhajan finishes the over with a yorker that McMillan hits hard into the ground and back to the bowler, the crowd thinks it's a catch
massive six! Oram skips down the track, gets to the pitch of Yuvraj's slow delivery and lofts him handsomely over deep midwicket
and again! This time Oram takes it on the full and smashes it flat over the long-on boundary, New Zealand are turning it on
played off the pads behind square leg, Yuvraj bowled that much quicker and flatter
the third six of the over! McMillan got down on one knee and slog-swept that over the deep backward square leg boundary
he goes again but this time the lofted stroke straight down the ground bounces once before reaching the boundary
swept past short fine leg once again, Gambhir dives on the boundary to save the four, huge over for New Zealand, 25 off it
dropped! Oram pounced on a length delivery and smashes the pull straight to Karthik at square leg who drops a simple catch, that was hit hard but it flew straight to Karthik
pushed towards mid-on for a single
short of a length outside off stump, McMillan pulls it from outside off to deep midwicket to bring up the 50 partnership
well bowled, the yorker outside off stump, Oram tries to smash it but gets an inside edge towards Dhoni's right, McMillan calls for the single

hit straight down the ground, the ball bounces before Gambhir at long-off, he makes a hash of it by letting the ball bounce off his palms and go past him, he recovers in time to stop it reaching the boundary
driven hard towards cover for a single
he begins with a slower ball but the short length allowed McMillan plenty of time to wait for it and smash it straight back over the bowler's head, that six was measured at 94 meters
huge hit! Sreesanth came round the wicket and bowled it full, McMillan got his front foot out of the way and lofted it over deep midwicket
McMillan tries to make it a hat-trick but his attempted loft over cover hits a thick outside edge and flies to deep point
full toss outside off stump, Oram had backed away to make room and was too far away from the ball to play a shot
this time he does play a shot at a wide one outside off stump, Oram flays his arms at the full toss and slices it over the third-man boundary
caught in the deep! Oram backs away and hits a short-of-a-length ball with a flat bat straight to RP Singh at long off, Oram walks back after causing considerable damage
Agarkar strays on to the pads, you can't bowl there if your fine leg is in the circle, Vettori moves across his stumps and flicks to the fine-leg boundary
and again, terrible line on leg stump, Vettori nudges it off his pads between short fine leg and Dhoni for four more
full and wide outside off stump, Vettori reaches out for it and slices it through backward point for the third boundary of the over
Vettori moves a long way across his stumps and flicks a full ball through square leg, Sehwag is too slow in the deep to prevent the third
massive! Agarkar bowls a very short ball, McMillan top-edges a pull and sends the ball sailing over the fine-leg boundary
finally Agarkar gets his length right, he ends the over with a yorker outside off stump that McMillan tries to squeeze through point but gets beaten
bowled him! RP Singh bowls it full and straight, Vettori moves across his stumps and tries to chip it over short fine leg, he misses and RP hits
Bond edges his first delivery towards the third man boundary, everything going right for New Zealand

Bond swings and misses, McMillan runs through for the bye, Dhoni lobs the ball back to RP Singh who whips off the bails, Bond is well short but he's sacrificed his wicket in order to get McMillan on strike
length ball on off stump, McMillan smashes it towards cover for  a single

Mark Gillespie gets beaten outside the off stump, McMillan wants the strike and calls for the bye but this time Dhoni collects and hits the stumps at the striker's end and sends McMillan back to the dug out, what an innings he's played

another run-out! Patel swings and misses, Gillespie tries to steal the bye, Dhoni shies at the batsman's end but misses the stumps, RP Singh collects the ball on his follow through, turns around and hits the stumps at the bowler's end with Patel short of his ground
